short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Debug errors using Stack Overflow and AI assistants

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AeroDebug is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline the debugging process for developers by creating a seamless bridge between error detection and solution finding. When developers encounter code errors, they can simply select the error text or use the extension's popup interface to input their error message and select their programming language.
